channel.title: Best Keyboard Ever!
channel.description:
Sorry for the click-bait title, but it's no exaggeration:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/images/keyboard.jpg
I originally ordered it in January but the cherry mx red switches were out of stock until April, so I just received it a few minutes ago, so far it types really well too, awesome!!!!!

item.title: Best Keyboard Ever!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ordered it from http://www.wasdkeyboards.com/ where you can build and upload a custom layout for them to print on the key colors of your choice.

Here is an explanation of the keys I chose:

  1. F1 is Commander Riker, because he is called Number 1
  2. Escape is a shuttle, which you use to escape
  3. Both Enters have Picard, saying ‘Engage’ and ‘Make it So’
  4. OS keys are Linux penguins for obvious reasons
  5. Control keys are Nintendo Controllers
  6. Insert is a Borg, because they insert things into you
  7. Delete is a phaser, because they delete you
  8. Home is the Earth, my home
  9. End is a Borg cube, because when you see one, it’s the end
  10. Alt is the Debian symbol, because it’s the best ‘alternate’ operating system
  11. Shift keys say ‘Resistance is Futile’, and have a resistor, because, why not?
  12. Numpad Plus has Data, because you input Data on it?
  13. Caps lock, Shields Up
  14. The hardest part was painstakingly cutting out character heads and converting them to SVGs for all the F keys, they are in this order from F1 to F12:
    Riker, Janeway, Kirk, Sisco, Data, Geordi, O’Brien, Troi, Chakotay, 7 of 9, Tuvok, Spock

If anyone wants the file I made this from to print this or a variant of this keyboard or just to play around, let me know and I’ll upload it someplace, it works in inkscape.

Read full topic
